title: ec to rr
content: Iâ€™ve heard you can shift from ec to rr campus after 1st year depending on cgpa. Is it possible?

comments.body: If u want cse then u need 9.6+ cgpa, for aiml 8.2-8.3, ece about 7.2-7.3
You can but it's not worth it, RR has better infra but is very crowded, EC has more active clubs and doesn't feel as claustrophobic.
